characters: Multiple pedestrians, including a child in a blue jacket on the right side of the road, a woman with a child on the left side of the road, and a man in a black jacket on the right side of the road.
summary: The video sequence shows several instances of ghost probing behavior. In the first sequence, a child suddenly emerges from the right side of the road, hidden behind a parked vehicle, creating an immediate collision risk. In the second sequence, a woman with a child suddenly appears from behind a parked vehicle on the left side of the road, also creating a collision risk. In the third sequence, a man in a black jacket suddenly emerges from the right side of the road, hidden behind a building, creating another immediate collision risk.
actions: The child on the right side of the road suddenly runs into the driving lane. The woman with a child on the left side of the road suddenly appears in the driving lane. The man in a black jacket on the right side of the road suddenly appears in the driving lane.
key_objects: Parked vehicles on both sides of the road, a building on the right side of the road, and multiple pedestrians.
